Bulk#

class abcmodel.mixed_layer.bulk.BulkMixedLayerInitConds(abl_height, theta, dtheta, wtheta, q, dq, wq, co2, dCO2, wCO2, u, du, v, dv, dz_h, surf_pressure, wstar=0.0, we=-1.0, wCO2A=0.0, wCO2R=0.0, wCO2M=0.0, thetav=nan, dthetav=nan, wthetav=nan, wqe=nan, qsat=nan, e=nan, esat=nan, wCO2e=nan, wthetae=nan, wthetave=nan, lcl=nan, top_rh=nan, utend=nan, dutend=nan, vtend=nan, dvtend=nan, htend=nan, thetatend=nan, dthetatend=nan, qtend=nan, dqtend=nan, co2tend=nan, dCO2tend=nan, dztend=nan)[source]#

Bases: object

Data class for bulk mixed layer model initial state.

abl_height: float#

Initial ABL height [m].

theta: float#

Initial mixed-layer potential temperature [K].

dtheta: float#

Initial temperature jump at h [K].

wtheta: float#

Surface kinematic heat flux [K m/s].

q: float#

Initial mixed-layer specific humidity [kg/kg].

dq: float#

Initial specific humidity jump at h [kg/kg].

wq: float#

Surface kinematic moisture flux [kg/kg m/s].

co2: float#

Initial mixed-layer CO2 [ppm].

dCO2: float#

Initial CO2 jump at h [ppm].

wCO2: float#

Surface kinematic CO2 flux [mgC/m²/s].

u: float#

Initial mixed-layer u-wind speed [m/s].

du: float#

Initial u-wind jump at h [m/s].

v: float#

Initial mixed-layer v-wind speed [m/s].

dv: float#

Initial v-wind jump at h [m/s].

dz_h: float#

Transition layer thickness [m].

surf_pressure: float#

Surface pressure, which is actually not updated (not a state), it’s only here for simplicity [Pa].

wstar: float = 0.0#

Convective velocity scale [m s-1].

we: float = -1.0#

Entrainment velocity [m s-1].

wCO2A: float = 0.0#

Surface assimulation CO2 flux [mgC/m²/s].

wCO2R: float = 0.0#

Surface respiration CO2 flux [mgC/m²/s].

wCO2M: float = 0.0#

CO2 mass flux [mgC/m²/s].

thetav: float = nan#

Mixed-layer potential temperature [K].

dthetav: float = nan#

Virtual temperature jump at h [K].

wthetav: float = nan#

Surface kinematic virtual heat flux [K m s-1].

wqe: float = nan#

Entrainment moisture flux [kg kg-1 m s-1].

qsat: float = nan#

Saturation specific humidity [kg/kg].

e: float = nan#

Vapor pressure [Pa].

esat: float = nan#

Saturation vapor pressure [Pa].

wCO2e: float = nan#

Entrainment CO2 flux [mgC/m²/s].

wthetae: float = nan#

Entrainment potential temperature flux [K m s-1].

wthetave: float = nan#

Entrainment virtual heat flux [K m s-1].

lcl: float = nan#

Lifting condensation level [m].

top_rh: float = nan#

Top of mixed layer relative humidity [%].

utend: float = nan#

Zonal wind velocity tendency [m s-2].

dutend: float = nan#

Zonal wind velocity tendency at the ABL height [m s-2].

vtend: float = nan#

Meridional wind velocity tendency [m s-2].

dvtend: float = nan#

Meridional wind velocity tendency at the ABL height [m/s²].

htend: float = nan#

Tendency of CBL [m s-1].

thetatend: float = nan#

Tendency of mixed-layer potential temperature [K s-1].

dthetatend: float = nan#

Tendency of mixed-layer potential temperature at the ABL height [K s-1].

qtend: float = nan#

Tendency of mixed-layer specific humidity [kg/kg s-1].

dqtend: float = nan#

Tendency of mixed-layer specific humidity at the ABL height [kg/kg s-1].

co2tend: float = nan#

Tendency of CO2 concentration [ppm s-1].

dCO2tend: float = nan#

Tendency of CO2 concentration at the ABL height [ppm s-1].

dztend: float = nan#

Tendency of transition layer thickness [m s-1].

class abcmodel.mixed_layer.bulk.BulkMixedLayerModel(divU, coriolis_param, gammatheta, advtheta, beta, gammaq, advq, gammaCO2, advCO2, gammau, advu, gammav, advv, dFz, sw_shearwe=True, sw_fixft=True, sw_wind=True)[source]#

Bases: AbstractStandardStatsModel

Bulk mixed layer model with full atmospheric boundary layer dynamics.

Complete mixed layer model that simulates atmospheric boundary layer evolution including entrainment, subsidence, cloud effects, and wind dynamics.

  1. Calculate large-scale vertical motions and compensating effects.

  2. Determine convective velocity scale and entrainment parameters.

  3. Compute all tendency terms for mixed layer variables.

  4. Integrate prognostic equations forward in time.

Parameters:

  • sw_shearwe (bool) – shear growth mixed-layer switch.

  • sw_fixft (bool) – fix the free-troposphere switch.

  • sw_wind (bool) – prognostic wind switch.

  • divU (float) – horizontal large-scale divergence of wind [s-1].

  • coriolis_param (float) – Coriolis parameter [s-1].

  • gammatheta (float) – free atmosphere potential temperature lapse rate [K m-1].

  • advtheta (float) – advection of heat [K s-1].

  • beta (float) – entrainment ratio for virtual heat [-].

  • gammaq (float) – free atmosphere specific humidity lapse rate [kg/kg m-1].

  • advq (float) – advection of moisture [kg/kg s-1].

  • gammaCO2 (float) – free atmosphere CO2 lapse rate [ppm m-1].

  • advCO2 (float) – advection of CO2 [ppm s-1].

  • gammau (float) – free atmosphere u-wind speed lapse rate [s-1].

  • advu (float) – advection of u-wind [m s-2].

  • gammav (float) – free atmosphere v-wind speed lapse rate [s-1].

  • advv (float) – advection of v-wind [m s-2].

  • dFz (float) – cloud top radiative divergence [W m-2].

calculate_vertical_motions(abl_height, dtheta, const)[source]#

Calculate large-scale subsidence and radiative divergence effects.

calculate_free_troposphere_compensation(ws)[source]#

Calculate compensation terms to fix free troposphere values.

calculate_convective_velocity_scale(abl_height, wthetav, thetav, g)[source]#

Calculate convective velocity scale and entrainment parameters.

calculate_entrainment_velocity(abl_height, wthetave, dthetav, thetav, ustar, g)[source]#

Calculate entrainment velocity with optional shear effects.

static calculate_entrainment_fluxes(we, dtheta, dq, dCO2)[source]#

Calculate all entrainment fluxes.

calculate_mixed_layer_tendencies(ws, wf, wq, wqe, we, cc_mf, cc_qf, wtheta, wthetae, abl_height, wCO2, wCO2e, wCO2M, w_th_ft, w_q_ft, w_CO2_ft)[source]#

Calculate tendency terms for mixed layer variables.

calculate_wind_tendencies(we, wf, uw, vw, cc_mf, du, dv, abl_height)[source]#

Calculate wind tendency terms if wind is prognostic.

calculate_transition_layer_tendency(lcl, abl_height, cc_frac, dz_h)[source]#

Calculate transition layer thickness tendency.

run(state, const)[source]#

Calculate mixed layer tendencies and update diagnostic variables.

integrate(state, dt)[source]#

Integrate mixed layer forward in time.
